name: ListRealmAssignmentOperations
description:
Retrieve a list of realm assignment operations.

This tool lists all realm assignment operations, with a limit of 200, sorted from most recent to oldest by ID.

parameters.name: return_limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of realm assignment operations to return. The upper limit is 200.

value_schema.description: A limit on the number of objects to return

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: The cursor for pagination. An opaque string from the `Link` response header indicating the current list position.

value_schema.description: The cursor to use for pagination. It is an opaque string that specifies your current location in the list and is obtained from the `Link` response header. See [Pagination](https://developer.okta.com/docs/api/#pagination).
